entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022
